items.title: Victoria Peak
items.description: Experience panoramic views of Hong Kong from the highest point in the city.

items.title: Star Ferry
items.address: Star Ferry Pier, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
items.description: Enjoy a scenic ride across Victoria Harbour on the historic Star Ferry.

items.title: Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade
items.address: Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
items.description: Stroll along the waterfront and enjoy views of Hong Kong's stunning skyline.

items.title: Mong Kok Market
items.description: Explore vibrant street markets and taste authentic local cuisine in one of Hong Kong's busiest districts.

items.title: Temple Street Night Market
items.description: Experience the bustling energy and local flavors at Hong Kong's famous night market.

items.title: Hong Kong Disneyland
items.description: Enjoy a day of magic and fun at Hong Kong's beloved theme park.

items.title: Big Buddha
items.address: Ngong Ping, Lantau Island, Hong Kong
items.description: Visit the majestic Tian Tan Buddha, a symbol of peace and spirituality.

items.title: Man Mo Temple
items.description: Discover the rich cultural heritage of Hong Kong at the historic Man Mo Temple.
